attributes.action: give the british people the right of a referendum
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the government was elected to manage the country and uphold and enforce the laws of the land NOT TO HAND OVER CONTROL TO FORIEGN POWERS,YOU HAVE YOUR OWN ADJENDA WHICH DIFFERS TO THAT OF THE BRITISH PEOPLE.YOU HAVE NO MANDATE TO DEFER POWER TO EUROPE.AS FAR AS MOST OF THE POPULATION IS CONCERNRD YOU HAVE NOT BEEN ELECTED.
YOU ARE SELLING US OUT.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
